name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Analytics Engineer with 9+ years of experience in data transformation, data modeling, and data analysis. Proficient in **SQL**, **dbt**, **SQLMesh**, and developing data pipelines that support advanced analytics and decision-making processes. Experienced in utilizing **AI tools** to enhance data-driven insights. Strong technical background in **microservices architecture**, and distributed systems with exposure to technologies like **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, **Redis**, and frontend technologies such as **ReactJS** and **NextJS**. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and deliver high-quality solutions that optimize performance and streamline development processes.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and optimized complex **SQL** queries for enhanced data retrieval, significantly improving data processing efficiency by **25%**.
Utilized **dbt** for data transformation, enhancing data model performance and clarity across analytics pipelines.
Designed and implemented effective **data pipelines** for transforming and moving data efficiently, ensuring data integrity and availability.
Conducted comprehensive **data analysis** to uncover insights for strategic decision-making, leading to a **30%** increase in actionable insights.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to create robust **data models** that support business intelligence and reporting needs.
Employed **AI tools** to automate data quality checks, reducing manual oversight and improving data accuracy by **40%**.
Spearheaded initiatives to integrate **blockchain** solutions for secure data transactions and **smart contracts** for complex agreements.
Enhanced data storage solutions by implementing best practices in data management, optimizing access and retrieval speeds by **15%**.

Collaborated with teams to document processes and maintain the clarity of analytical workflows for onboarding new team members.

Utilized **SQL** to analyze and transform data for actionable insights, improving decision-making processes across the organization.
Designed robust data models and pipelines using **dbt** and **SQLMesh**, enhancing data integrity and accessibility for analytics.
Developed smart contracts on a **blockchain** platform, ensuring secure and transparent data transactions, resulting in a **30%** increase in trust among stakeholders.
Implemented effective data transformation strategies, leading to more efficient data flow with a **20%** reduction in processing time.
Conducted data analysis with advanced **AI tools**, yielding predictive insights that contributed to a **15%** uptick in revenue generation.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define analytics requirements, ensuring alignment with business objectives and timely delivery of projects.
Created custom SQL queries for data extraction and manipulation, optimizing performance and responsiveness of analytics reports.
Led initiatives to improve data accuracy and quality across the organization, resulting in a **25%** decrease in data-related errors.
Mentored junior analysts in best practices for data modeling and analysis, enhancing team effectiveness and skill development.
Presented analytical findings and visualizations to stakeholders, facilitating informed decision-making and strategic planning.

Utilized **SQL** for efficient data analysis and management, ensuring accuracy and insights for decision-making across projects.
Developed and maintained data transformation processes using **dbt**, enhancing data quality through automated workflows.
Implemented **SQLMesh** to manage complex data pipelines, ensuring seamless data integration and lineage tracking.
Collaborated on blockchain projects, contributing to the development of **smart contracts** that automate business processes and improve transaction security.
Designed and executed robust data models to support analytical initiatives, driving clarity and consistency across datasets.
Leveraged AI tools to enhance data analysis capabilities, enabling predictive insights that informed strategic business decisions.
Created and optimized data pipelines, which increased data retrieval efficiency by **30%**, leading to faster insights delivery.
Executed thorough data analysis techniques to interpret large datasets, resulting in improved operational efficiencies and informed decision-making processes.
Regularly communicated quantitative insights through detailed reports and visualizations, facilitating understanding across non-technical stakeholders.
Maintained comprehensive documentation of data processes, fostering knowledge transfer and ensuring alignment with best practices.
